ai-tha-ap147:1.3_0: (but) I am successful in the Fortunate One’s presence,
ai-tha-ap147:2.4_0: I cry out at the very moment.
ai-tha-ap147:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap147:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap147:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap147:3.4_0: this is the fruit of a Shrine.
ai-tha-ap147:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Uppalavaṇṇā.
ai-tha-ap147:7.1_0: The fifth Elder Uppalavaṇṇā was the fifth Great King
